headline: Reassessing Omnicom (OMC) Valuation After Its Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: Why Omnicom Group stock is back on investors’ radar Omnicom Group (OMC) has quietly put together a steady rebound, with shares up around 9% over the past week and 8% over the past month, despite being down year to date. See our latest analysis for Omnicom Group. The recent pop in Omnicom’s share price, now around $80.25, follows a solid run of contract wins and upbeat sentiment on marketing spend. It comes after a negative year to date share price return but still respectable multi year total...
